text: Nigba ti o ba ri won, irisi won yoo jo o loju. Ti won ba n soro, iwo yoo teti gbo oro won. Won si da bi igi ti won gbe ti ogiri. Won si n lero pe gbogbo igbe (ibosi) n be lori won (nipa isobe-selu won). Ota ni won. Nitori naa, sora fun won. Allahu ti sebi le won. Bawo ni won se n seri won kuro nibi ododo
